body_html: Hi @ptarjan, as mentioned in our Contribution doc, we don't accept pull requests through github yet, and our contribution flow through googlesource.com isn't that easy yet -- for a change like this, would you mind if we fix internally and push the change out for you?
body_text: Hi @ptarjan, as mentioned in our Contribution doc, we don't accept pull requests through github yet, and our contribution flow through googlesource.com isn't that easy yet -- for a change like this, would you mind if we fix internally and push the change out for you?
body: Hi @ptarjan, as mentioned in our [Contribution doc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md), we don't accept pull requests through github yet, and our contribution flow through googlesource.com isn't that easy yet -- for a change like this, would you mind if we fix internally and push the change out for you?
